title: French policeman who took place of hostage dies
text:
French policeman who took place of hostage dies Saturday, March 24, 2018 - 01:35 
A gendarme who was shot three times after voluntarily taking the place of a hostage during a supermarket siege in southwestern France on Friday has died, France announced on Saturday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A gendarme who was shot three times after voluntarily taking the place of a hostage during a supermarket siege in southwestern France on Friday has died, France announced on Saturday.
